page.title: 13Leisure Activities
page.content: Smarden has clubs and organisations to suit all ages and inclinations. The youthclub has a clubhouse and the Guides and Brownies their own hut. The sports pavilion is home to the cricket football and hockey teams which play on the Minnis while the Tennis Club has its court on the opposite corner. The younger boys have a BMX cycle track at the back of the Minnis. The Women's Institute, Gardeners' Society and Over 60s club meet in the village hall while smaller meetings are held in the committee room: the Ancient Order of Foresters, Parish Council, British Legion, Young Farmers' Club, Parochial Church Council and St Michael's Guild. In winter the Ashford Valley Foxhounds and Hunt meet at a Smarden public house and the Pony Club holds meetings at Bullands.
